messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Natalie  We are new to the group and have a 2 1/2 yo daughter.  I was just reading all the wonderful experiences at the
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Natalie <emerybehmed@...>

We are new to the group and have a 2 1/2 yo daughter. I was just
reading all the wonderful experiences at the conference and wondering
if anyone knew of an upcoming conference in Florida or in the
southeast.

-=-=-=-=-=-

The Live and Learn Unschooling Conference, its last year, in Black
Mountain (near Asheville), NC in September.



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

messages.subject: Re: Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, We are new to the group and have a 2 1/2 yo daughter.  I was just reading all the wonderful experiences at the conference and wondering if anyone knew
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

We are new to the group and have a 2 1/2 yo daughter. I was just
reading all the wonderful experiences at the conference and wondering
if anyone knew of an upcoming conference in Florida or in the
southeast.

Thanks for your inspiring stories!
Natalie

messages.subject: Re:Conference
messages.msgSnippet: We might take the trip to PA too - not that far from CT and DH spent several growing up years in Lancaster County (a little bitty town called Conestoga). Deb
messages.messageBody:
We might take the trip to PA too - not that far from CT and DH spent
several growing up years in Lancaster County (a little bitty town called
Conestoga).

Deb

messages.subject: Conference
messages.msgSnippet: I just registered last night for L&L Conference. Can t wait to meet you all there!!!!!!!!!! Thanks Kelly and sorry to bother you Sunday night. I could have
messages.messageBody:
I just registered last night for L&L Conference. Can't wait to meet you
all there!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks Kelly and sorry to bother you Sunday night.
I could have talked for hours with you....
I will be there Tuesday afternoon and would love any tips on what to
bring to my then 5 year old ds and 18 month old dd.
Any other tips on the Conference will be greatly appreciated.
I will also be staying in NC to visit family and friends for another
week maybe I can get together with other moms in The Greensboro,
Charlotte or Burlington Area!!
Alex
